bio.en: Dr. Mey Chan is a leading researcher in machine learning with a focus on deep learning applications in healthcare and finance. She holds a PhD from UC Berkeley and has published extensively in top-tier journals. Mey has 8 years of industry experience at companies like Tesla and NVIDIA, where she led AI research teams developing autonomous driving systems and GPU-accelerated ML frameworks.

bio.en: David Kim is a seasoned full-stack developer with 12 years of experience building scalable web applications. He specializes in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. David has worked at startups and large corporations, leading development teams and architecting solutions for millions of users. He's passionate about teaching modern web development practices and helping students build production-ready applications.

bio.en: Sarah Patel is a frontend development expert with a passion for creating beautiful, accessible user interfaces. With 8 years of experience at companies like Airbnb and Spotify, she specializes in React, Vue.js, and modern CSS frameworks. Sarah is dedicated to teaching responsive design, accessibility, and performance optimization to help students create world-class user experiences.
